snippet: Two broken elevators in the Metropolitan Correctional Center delayed sentencing for Mansour J. Arbabsiar, who took part in a plot to assassinate the Saudi ambassador to the United States.
abstract: Two broken elevators in the Metropolitan Correctional Center in Manhattan delay sentencing for Mansour J Arbabsiar, Iranian-American who pleaded guilty in a plot to assassinate the Saudi ambassador to the United States; sentencing is postponed until May 8.
lead_paragraph: Two broken elevators in the Metropolitan Correctional Center delayed sentencing for Mansour J. Arbabsiar, who took part in a plot to assassinate the Saudi ambassador to the United States.

headline.seo: Broken Elevators Separate Lawyers and Clients at Jail
headline.main: Jail’s Broken Elevators Delay High-Profile Sentencing
headline.print_headline: Jail’s Broken Elevators Delay High-Profile Sentencing
